summary: As they prepare to test products for a multinational corporation, a marketing company targets a typical guy as their guinea pig.
cast: Khalid Maadour|Caroline Dhavernas|Chantal Lauby|Gilbert Melki|Thierry Lhermitte|Delphine Rich|Amina Annabi|Rachid Chaib|Zakariya Gouram|Pierre Lognay|Suzan Anbeh|Christelle Cornil|Arthur Pagliuca|Rémi Pagliuca|Renaud Rutten|François Vincentelli|Francois-Michel Van den Rest|Laurent Van den Rest|Laurence Bibot|Benoît Verhaert|Delphine Ysaye|Bach-Lan Lee Ba Thi|Anid Lobato de Faria|Guy Lecluyse|Jan Hammenecker|Axel Saint-Just|Laurent Van Wetter|France Bastoen|Jean-Luc Couchard|Hugues Hausman|Pascal Lefebvre|Abraham Belaga|Didier Bourguignon|Nolwenn Le Du|Claudio Dos Santos|Cecilia Kankonda|Valérie Bodson|Thomas Coemans|Thomas Coumans|Michel Di Vesti|Helga Dieli|David Fink|Dominique Fontaine|Marielle Hardy|Michel Huctin|Candida Julio|Emilie Luciani|Vincent Massin|Serge Mauro|Jenny Muller|Van Le N'Guyen|Véronique Odrian|Sandrine Pierre|Louise Renders|Simon Renders|Adèle Romano|Norbert Rutili|Jean Schmidt|Colette Sodoyez|Jos Wecker
title: Comme tout le monde
